
		<h1 class="postTitle">
			<a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoweiyu/p/18821619" title="发布于 2025-04-12 00:23">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">明天周日，欢迎参加Clean DDD 技术沙龙 2025 杭州站</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>整洁领域驱动设计（Clean DDD）第一次线下活动来了，这是：</p>
<p>一个软件设计的全新视角</p>
<p>一次复杂度掌控感的深度体验</p>
<p>一场软件工程效率的探索之旅</p>
<p>活动时间：2025年4月13日星期日 下午 13:00 - 17:00</p>
<p>参会地点：杭州市滨江区聚业路27号电魂大厦B座17层学习园地会议厅</p>
<p>参与方式：微信扫码或点击文末阅读原文报名。</p>
<p>PS： 本活动对学生群体免费，在线报名后，凭学生证入场。</p>
<h1 id="活动议程">活动议程</h1>
<h3 id="_"></h3>
<h3 id="_-1"></h3>
<table style="width: 550px; visibility: visible"><tbody style="visibility: visible"><tr style="visibility: visible"><td data-colwidth="550" style="background-color: rgba(0, 252, 255, 1); visibility: visible"><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">议程</span></span></section></td></tr><tr style="visibility: visible"><td data-colwidth="550" style="visibility: visible"><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;h3&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;heading-3 ace-line old-record-id-HXhUd7obBoudwHxHAngcCDrynrf&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">13:00-13:10&nbsp;</span></span></section><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;h3&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;heading-3 ace-line old-record-id-HXhUd7obBoudwHxHAngcCDrynrf&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">签到</span></span></section></td></tr><tr style="visibility: visible"><td data-colwidth="550" style="visibility: visible"><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;h3&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;heading-3 ace-line old-record-id-BfkpdVioFo8YfwxZvEPcNbZdnih&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">13:10-14:10&nbsp;</span></span></section><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;h3&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;heading-3 ace-line old-record-id-BfkpdVioFo8YfwxZvEPcNbZdnih&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">Clean DDD 是如何诞生的 - 一场历时10年的探索历程</span></span></section><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="color: rgba(136, 136, 136, 1); visibility: visible">深度解析 Clean DDD 的发展过程，回答它的三个终极问题：Clean DDD 是什么？为什么需要 Clean DDD ？如何实践 Clean DDD ？</span></span></section></td></tr><tr style="visibility: visible"><td data-colwidth="550" style="visibility: visible"><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">14:10-15:10&nbsp;</span></span></section><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">cap4j 最新介绍 - &nbsp;基于SpringBoot 如何实现 Clean DDD</span></span></section><p style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="color: rgba(136, 136, 136, 1); visibility: visible">cap4j核心功能UnitOfWork以及Mediator的介绍。框架如何平衡侵入性和便利性？介绍未来迭代的方向。</span></span></p></td></tr><tr style="visibility: visible"><td data-colwidth="550" style="visibility: visible"><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">15:10-15:40&nbsp;</span></span></section><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">如何使用工具让 DDD 的思想变得理所当然，顺理成章</span></span></section><p style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="color: rgba(136, 136, 136, 1); visibility: visible">工具在潜移默化的改变我们对编程的思考，我们该使用何种工具来让我们顺理成章的，自然而然的使用 DDD 思想进行业务设计和编程呢？</span></span></p></td></tr><tr style="visibility: visible"><td data-colwidth="550" style="visibility: visible"><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">15:40-16:10&nbsp;</span></span></section><section style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold; visibility: visible">从 CRUD 到 DDD 的蜕变过程</span></span></section><p style="visibility: visible"><span leaf="" style="visibility: visible"><span textstyle="" style="color: rgba(136, 136, 136, 1); visibility: visible">分享DDD落地的过程与经验，展示工具与心智相互影响迭代的过程，聊聊Clean DDD 带来的变化。让Web应用开发更容易设计，更容易实现，更容易迭代。</span></span></p></td></tr><tr><td data-colwidth="550"><section><span leaf="" data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;h3&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;heading-3 ace-line old-record-id-JjQLdim8KoISpPx5RCicBQY0nAC&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold">16:10-17:00&nbsp;</span></span></section><section><span leaf="" data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;h3&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;heading-3 ace-line old-record-id-JjQLdim8KoISpPx5RCicBQY0nAC&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]"><span textstyle="" style="font-weight: bold">交流互动</span></span></section></td></tr></tbody></table>
